text: Klaus Martin Schwab (born 30 March 1938) is a German engineer and economist. He is best known as the founder and executive chairman of the World Economic Forum. He was born in Ravensburg, Germany. In April 2025, Klaus Schwab steps down as leader of the World Economic Forum, which he founded in 1971. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:German mechanical engineers Category:German economists Category:German academics Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg
title: Klaus Schwab
